```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, echo = T}
library(ggplot2)
tags <- read.csv("tags.csv")
head(tags)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = tags, aes(x = count)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 4) + xlim(0, 5000)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = tags, aes(x = count)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 1) + xlim(0, 1000)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = tags, aes(x = count)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 1) + xlim(0, 100)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = tags, aes(log(tags$count))) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.2)
```


```{r}
tags <- tags[order(-tags$count),]
tags$number <- 1:dim(tags)[1]
ggplot(data = tags, aes(x = number, y = log(count))) + geom_line(size = 1) 
```
